AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_ElementValue AS Account_ID (active)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='AC' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@) AND C_ElementValue.IsActive='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_ChangeNotice of BOM Component
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM M_BOM b WHERE b.M_Product_ID=@M_ProductBOM_ID@ AND b.M_ChangeNotice_ID=M_ChangeNotice.M_ChangeNotice_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts User1
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='U1' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Accounts User2
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='U2' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_Lot of AttributeSetInstance
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: M_Lot.M_Product_ID IN (SELECT M_Product_ID FROM M_Product WHERE M_AttributeSet_ID=@M_AttributeSet_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner Bill
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Ship BP - or - all if not SO - or - Related BP
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner.IsSummary='N' AND (C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID=@C_BPartner_ID@ OR 'N'='@IsSOTrx@' OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BP_Relation r WHERE C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID=r.C_BPartnerRelation_ID AND r.C_BPartner_ID=@C_BPartner_ID@ AND r.IsBillTo='Y'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner Bill Proxy's
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner.IsSummary='N' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BP_Relation r WHERE C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID=r.C_BPartnerRelation_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner w SO to invoice
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: BPartners with invoices to be invoiced
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_BPartner.IsSummary='N' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_Order o INNER JOIN C_OrderLine l ON (o.C_Order_ID=l.C_Order_ID) WHERE C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID=o.C_BPartner_ID AND o.DocStatus NOT IN ('DR','IP') AND l.QtyOrdered <> l.QtyInvoiced AND o.IsSOTrx='Y')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_ElementValue AS Account_ID
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_AcctSchema_Element ae WHERE C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID=ae.C_Element_ID AND ae.ElementType='AC' AND ae.C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_ElementValue AS/ET
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Current Accounting Schema - Record contains ElementType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID IN (SELECT C_Element_ID FROM C_AcctSchema_Element WHERE C_AcctSchema_ID=@C_AcctSchema_ID@ AND ElementType='@ElementType@')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Order in Payment
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Waiting Payment or Standard Order with ininvoiced lines
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (C_Order.DocStatus='WP' OR (C_Order.DocStatus='CO' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_DocType dt WHERE C_Order.C_DocType_ID=dt.C_DocType_ID AND dt.DocSubTypeSO='SO') AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_OrderLine ol WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=ol.C_Order_ID AND ol.QtyInvoiced<>ol.QtyOrdered)))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: R_Status of Request Type
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM R_RequestType rt INNER JOIN R_StatusCategory sc ON (rt.R_StatusCategory_ID=sc.R_StatusCategory_ID) WHERE R_Status.R_StatusCategory_ID=sc.R_StatusCategory_ID AND rt.R_RequestType_ID=@R_RequestType_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Invoices and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR/AP Invoice and Credit Memos

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org Login
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Not Summary - Restrict to Login Organization

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Payment not in BankStatement
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BankStatementLine bsl INNER JOIN C_BankStatement bs ON (bsl.C_BankStatement_ID=bs.C_BankStatement_ID) WHERE bsl.C_Payment_ID=C_Payment.C_Payment_ID AND bs.DocStatus<>'VO') AND C_Payment.DocStatus IN ('CO','CL','RE') AND C_Payment.PayAmt<>0 AND C_Payment.IsReconciled='N' AND C_Payment.C_BankAccount_ID=@C_BankAccount_ID@

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org Not Linked
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Not Summary - Not 0 - Not linked to BP
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Org.AD_Org_ID <> 0 AND AD_Org.IsSummary='N' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BPartner bp WHERE AD_Org.AD_Org_ID=bp.AD_OrgBP_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Table with Posted
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM AD_Column c WHERE AD_Table.AD_Table_ID=c.AD_Table_ID AND c.IsActive='Y' AND c.ColumnName='Posted') AND AD_Table.IsView='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Column in Import Table
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Column.AD_Table_ID=@AD_Table_ID@ AND AD_Column.IsKey='N' AND AD_Column.ColumnName NOT IN ('I_IsImported', 'I_ErrorMsg')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Period Open
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_PeriodControl pc WHERE C_Period.C_Period_ID=pc.C_Period_ID AND pc.PeriodStatus='O')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_Product To UOM
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: M_Product.IsSummary='N' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM M_Product pp WHERE pp.M_Product_ID=@M_Product_ID@ AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_UOM_Conversion c WHERE M_Product.C_UOM_ID=c.C_UOM_To_ID AND pp.C_UOM_ID=c.C_UOM_ID) )

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_UOM Product Options
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_UOM uu WHERE C_UOM.C_UOM_ID=uu.C_UOM_ID AND IsDefault='Y' AND @M_Product_ID@=0) OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM M_Product p WHERE C_UOM.C_UOM_ID=p.C_UOM_ID AND @M_Product_ID@=p.M_Product_ID) OR EXISTS (SELECT * FROM M_Product p INNER JOIN C_UOM_Conversion c ON (p.C_UOM_ID=c.C_UOM_ID AND p.M_Product_ID=c.M_Product_ID) WHERE C_UOM.C_UOM_ID=c.C_UOM_TO_ID AND @M_Product_ID@=p.M_Product_ID))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Period of Calendar
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_Year y WHERE C_Period.C_Year_ID=y.C_Year_ID AND y.C_Calendar_ID=@C_Calendar_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_InOutLine Receipts
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM M_InOut io WHERE M_InOutLine.M_InOut_ID=io.M_InOut_ID AND io.IsSOTrx='N')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Job BPartner.IsEmployee
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Job.IsEmployee=(SELECT IsEmployee FROM C_BPartner WHERE C_BPartner_ID=@C_BPartner_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Material Difference
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type Material Shipments and Receipts for Split Differnce

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Project of BPartner
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Project of BP or SR or none
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Project.IsSummary='N' AND (C_Project.C_BPartner_ID IS NULL OR C_Project.C_BPartner_ID=@C_BPartner_ID@ OR C_Project.C_BPartnerSR_ID=@C_BPartner_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Invoice of Payment
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Invoice.DocStatus IN ('CO', 'CL') AND C_Invoice.C_Currency_ID=@C_Currency_ID@ AND C_Invoice.C_BPartner_ID=@C_BPartner_ID@ AND C_Invoice.IsSOTrx='@IsReceipt@'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_BPartner w Advertisement
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM W_Advertisement a WHERE C_BPartner.C_BPartner_ID=a.C_BPartner_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_ElementValue Default ET
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Default Accounting Schema - Record contains ElementType
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID IN (SELECT C_Element_ID FROM C_AcctSchema_Element WHERE C_AcctSchema_ID=@$C_AcctSchema_ID@ AND ElementType='@ElementType@')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Table with ASI
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Tables with updateable column Attribute Set Instance
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM AD_Column c WHERE AD_Table.AD_Table_ID=c.AD_Table_ID AND c.ColumnName='M_AttributeSetInstance_ID' AND c.IsUpdateable='Y') AND AD_Table.IsView='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_User - Internal
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_BPartner bp WHERE AD_User.C_BPartner_ID=bp.C_BPartner_ID AND (bp.IsEmployee='Y' OR bp.IsSalesRep='Y'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Project - WorkOrder/Asset active
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Project.IsSummary='N' AND C_Project.ProjectCategory IN ('W','A') AND C_Project.Processed<>'Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_InOut Receipts of Project
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: (M_InOut.C_Project_ID IS NULL OR M_InOut.C_Project_ID=@C_Project_ID@) AND M_InOut.Processed='Y' AND M_InOut.IsSOTrx='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Order Open Quote
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_Order.DocStatus='IP' AND C_DocType_ID IN (SELECT C_DocType_ID FROM C_DocType WHERE DocSubTypeSO IN ('OB','ON'))

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: CM_Template Node of WebProject
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: CM_Template.CM_WebProject_ID=@CM_WebProject_ID@ AND CM_Template.IsSummary='N' AND CM_Template.IsInclude='N' AND CM_Template.IsValid='N'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: CM_Media node of Ad_Cat.WebProject
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: CM_Media.IsSummary='N' AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM CM_Ad_Cat c WHERE c.CM_Ad_Cat_ID=@CM_Ad_Cat_ID@ AND CM_Media.CM_WebProject_ID=c.CM_WebProject_ID)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Org Security validation
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Not Summary - 0 - Organizations of the Client with user acces rights

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: AD_Reference List or Table
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: AD_Reference.ValidationType=CASE WHEN @AD_Reference_ID@ IN (17,28) THEN 'L' ELSE 'T' END

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_InOutShipment/Receipt (RMA)
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: M_InOutLine.M_InOut_ID=@InOut_ID@ AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM M_RMALine rl WHERE rl.M_InOutLine_ID=M_InOutLine.M_InOutLine_ID AND rl.M_RMA_ID=@M_RMA_ID@)

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_ElementValue Def.AS Account_ID
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: C_ElementValue.C_Element_ID IN (SELECT C_Element_ID FROM C_AcctSchema_Element WHERE C_AcctSchema_ID=@$C_AcctSchema_ID@ AND ElementType='AC')

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType AR/AP Invoices and Credit Memos
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR/AP Invoice and Credit Memos

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType Material Shipments/Receipts
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type Material Shipments and Receipts

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_DocType AR Pro Forma Invoices
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Document Type AR Pro Forma Invoice

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_PriceList Base
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Base Pricelists need to have same currency

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: C_Order SO to be invoiced
AD_VAL_RULE.CODE: DocStatus NOT IN ('DR','IP') AND EXISTS (SELECT * FROM C_OrderLine WHERE C_Order.C_Order_ID=C_OrderLine.C_Order_ID AND QtyOrdered <> QtyInvoiced) AND IsSOTrx='Y'

AD_VAL_RULE.NAME: M_PriceList is SO/PO
AD_VAL_RULE.DESCRIPTION: Limits the Sales & Purchase Order window to the correct price lsits
